Name: Escape Room
About the game: You are trapped, with a bomb ticking nearby. Your only way out is to disable the bomb before it blows everything to oblivion. Look for hints and find the bomb. Now!! Your time is running short. This game is still in development. We would appriciate greatly if you could leave your feedbacks so that the game can be developed further.
